betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oSadly, offering a questbook refresh as quest reward crashes on dedicated servers... so read this through.§r

Whenever you §dupdate the modpack§r, run the Command §9§l/bq_admin default load§r.
This quest §cdoes §cnot run it§r, you have to type it yourself.

Be sure to §4not forget§r it, as there are frequent changes to the Questbook.

§oYes, I repeated myself several times, I know. But that way you won't forget... right? *pleading_face*§r
